Text:
Thanks HighCode
A10
V10
M9

Multisubs excellent for language students. All accents display in the Roman alphabet. Cyrillic, Hangul, Chinese - all display beautifully.
Why can't everybody encode subtitles like this ? Please share your secret HighCode.

You're welcome AsifAkheir.
I save them with Notepad++ as utf-8 under the right ISO.
